name: AWS Data Center UPS & Power Infrastructure
description: Installed and commissioned critical power infrastructure across AWS data centers, including UPS battery racks, addressed distribution cabling, generator interconnects, and final commissioning of bus duct systems during load bank testing.
notes: Installed and configured UPS battery racks, including addressable modules and secure cable routing.
Distributed high-amperage addressed cables from UPS racks to server cabinets and switchboards.
Ran and terminated communication lines between ATS, switchgear, and generator systems for central monitoring.
Supported final commissioning with QA and safety checks of electrical bus duct across data halls.
Participated in load bank testing to validate real-world failover and load handling behavior.
Ensured all work was compliant with NFPA 70E and local AHJ requirements for energized equipment.

name: Servo Press Assembly & Retrofit – AIDA America
description: Worked as a subcontractor for AIDA America assembling and retrofitting servo-controlled metal forming presses ranging from 200 to 4,000 metric tons. Involved in both in-house press manufacturing and on-site retrofitting for operational customer presses.
notes: Installed and routed communication cables between sensors, control modules, and safety systems according to complex engineered schematics.
Planned around hydraulic, mechanical, and operational constraints to execute clean, reliable electrical runs in high-density equipment.
Worked on presses rated up to 4,000 metric tons in an ISO 9001:2015 certified manufacturing environment.
Participated in full testing and QA analysis for completed servo presses prior to shipment.
Traveled on-site to customer factories to retrofit legacy mechanical presses with modern PLCs and updated safety interlocks — often in live production settings.
Collaborated closely with mechanical and hydraulic teams to ensure full system integration and production-readiness.

name: Electrical QA & Infrared Inspection – TEGG Representative
description: Performed quality assurance and third-party verification for critical electrical systems using thermal imaging, ultrasonic testing, and mechanical inspection. Worked with a regional TEGG representative to assess and document the condition of transformers, motors, and conductor terminations for clients in hospitals, factories, and mission-critical environments.
notes: Executed electrical system inspections using infrared, ultrasonic, and mechanical testing equipment per TEGG standards.
Assessed the condition of power distribution equipment, including conductors, switchgear, transformers, and motors.
Collected and documented diagnostic data to support predictive maintenance and risk mitigation plans for insurance-backed guarantees.
Performed third-party installation verification for external clients seeking QA of work performed by other electrical contractors.
Worked in environments with strict uptime requirements, including manufacturing plants and healthcare facilities.
Produced QA reports and analysis for client delivery, supporting compliance, warranty, and operational reliability decisions.

name: Hyperscale Data Center Electrical Maintenance
description: Maintained and serviced critical electrical systems for hyperscale data centers, including ATS units, backup generators, inverters, and power distribution infrastructure. Specialized in redundant failover systems designed for mission-critical uptime and multi-megawatt loads.
notes: Maintained and serviced ATS, inverters, power monitoring, and air quality measurement infrastructure in hyperscale data centers.
Installed and maintained high-current 3-phase subpanels, transformers, and building-wide electrical infrastructure exceeding 10MW.
Specialized in supporting failover systems with zero-downtime requirements for mission-critical operations.
Performed monthly confidence testing and inspections of redundant power systems and backup generators.
Worked on relay-based control logic for automatic transfer switching and load balancing.
Ensured safe and compliant operations of high-reliability infrastructure supporting industrial-grade compute loads.
